channel.title: CVE Feed for Vivaldi Technologies -- Vivaldi installer for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vivaldi Technologies -- Vivaldi installer for Windows

item.title: CVE-2017-2156|2024-08-05T13:48:05.183Z -- vivaldi%20technologies -- vivaldi%20installer%20for%20windows
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Vivaldi installer for Windows prior to version 1.7.735.48 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted executable file in an unspecified directory.
